title: After Apple event, iPhone memes popped up faster than you can take a 'Slofie'
text:
New York (CNN Business) Well, that didn't take long...

Here's what some of them had to say:

Apple has added a new payment option for iPhone 11. #AppleEvent pic.twitter.com/qBCCkprWof — SHERY JATT (@Shery7862) September 10, 2019

The phone comes in three versions: The iPhone 11 and the higher-end iPhone 11 Pro and iPhone 11 Pro Max. The basic phone, at $699, is cheaper than many previous iterations of the iPhone. But people wanting one of the premium models will have to shell out $999 for the iPhone 11 Pro or $1,099 for the 11 Pro Max.

Those willing to chalk up the cash for one of the Pro models, targeted at professional videographers and photographers, will get a phone with three cameras on the back: telephoto, wide and ultra-wide lenses. The cameras can shoot multiple videos simultaneously. Not everyone loves the way they look, though.

I don't like iPhone 11, so I'll just wait for iPhone 12#AppleEvent pic.twitter.com/esyZsk1OLQ — Chris (@classichrixs) September 10, 2019

Read More
description: Apple unveiled the new iPhone 11 at its annual media event Tuesday, and people were quick to make their feelings about the model known on Twitter.
